allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''app'' AND table_name = ''user_exercise_history'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''app'' AND table_name LIKE ''%training%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%session%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%exercise%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%routine%'' ORDER BY table_name;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "\d+ app.vw_methodology_exercise_history")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "\d app.exercise_history")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_home_history FROM app.home_exercise_history WHERE user_id = 10;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "SELECT exercise_name, COUNT(*) as veces FROM app.home_exercise_history WHERE user_id = 10 GROUP BY exercise_name ORDER BY veces DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_regular_history FROM app.exercise_history WHERE user_id = 10;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "\d+ app.v_hist_real")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "\d+ app.v_hist_propuesto")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "
-- Corregir vista de rutinas con el campo correcto
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW app.v_routine_hist_real AS
SELECT 
    id,
    user_id,
    used_at as created_at,
    exercise_name,
    lower(regexp_replace(exercise_name::text, ''[^a-z0-9]+''::text, ''_''::text, ''g''::text))::character varying AS exercise_key,
    methodology_type,
    plan_id,
    week_number,
    day_name
FROM app.exercise_history;

-- Verificar las vistas
SELECT ''HOME TRAINING - Ejercicios completados:'' as categoria, COUNT(*) as total FROM app.v_home_hist_real WHERE user_id = 10
UNION ALL
SELECT ''HOME TRAINING - Ejercicios propuestos:'' as categoria, COUNT(*) as total FROM app.v_home_hist_propuesto WHERE user_id = 10
UNION ALL
SELECT ''RUTINAS - Ejercicios completados:'' as categoria, COUNT(*) as total FROM app.v_routine_hist_real WHERE user_id = 10;
")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "SELECT exercise_name, times_used, last_used_at FROM app.get_home_training_history(10, 5);")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "\d app.home_exercise_history")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "\d app.user_exercise_feedback")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "\d app.home_exercise_progress")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "SELECT exercise_name, status, series_completed, total_series FROM app.home_exercise_progress WHERE home_training_session_id = 66 ORDER BY exercise_order;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "SELECT combination_code, display_name FROM app.home_training_combinations ORDER BY equipment_type, training_type;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d entrenaconia -c "SELECT exercise_name, combination_code FROM app.get_exercises_for_combination(10, ''minimo'', ''funcional'', 10);")
